text: <a href="../2-Peter-3-1/" title="2 Peter 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in *both* which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:

<a href="../2-Peter-3-2/" title="2 Peter 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour:
<a href="../2-Peter-3-3/" title="2 Peter 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts,

<a href="../2-Peter-3-4/" title="2 Peter 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as *they were* from the beginning of the creation.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-5/" title="2 Peter 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 For this they willingly are ignorant of, that by the word of God the heavens were of old, and the earth standing out of the water and in the water:
<a href="../2-Peter-3-6/" title="2 Peter 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Whereby the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished:

<a href="../2-Peter-3-7/" title="2 Peter 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 But the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-8/" title="2 Peter 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day *is* with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-9/" title="2 Peter 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-10/" title="2 Peter 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-11/" title="2 Peter 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 *Seeing* then *that* all these things shall be dissolved, what manner *of persons* ought ye to be in *all* holy conversation and godliness,

<a href="../2-Peter-3-12/" title="2 Peter 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?

<a href="../2-Peter-3-13/" title="2 Peter 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-14/" title="2 Peter 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-15/" title="2 Peter 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 And account *that* the longsuffering of our Lord *is* salvation; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you;

<a href="../2-Peter-3-16/" title="2 Peter 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 As also in all *his* epistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, as *they do* also the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-17/" title="2 Peter 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 Ye therefore, beloved, seeing ye know *these things* before, beware lest ye also, being led away with the error of the wicked, fall from your own stedfastness.

<a href="../2-Peter-3-18/" title="2 Peter 3:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 But grow in grace, and *in* the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him *be* glory both now and for ever. Amen.
